sentence: The image is a promotional banner featuring the Fairfax County Courthouse on the left, depicted as a red-brick building with tall, arched windows.
sentence_cn: 该图是一条宣传横幅，左侧是费尔法克斯县法院，是一座红砖建筑，有高高的拱形窗户。

sentence: In the upper portion of the building facade, "FAIRFAX COUNTY COURTHOUSE" is inscribed.
sentence_cn: 建筑立面的上部刻有“费尔法克斯县法院”字样。

sentence: On the right side, the text announces the availability of the "NEW 8th Edition Fairfax Circuit Court Practice Manual (2014)" for $206.70, including tax.
sentence_cn: 右侧的文字宣布“新版第 8 版费尔法克斯巡回法院实践手册（2014 年）”现已上市，售价为 206.70 美元（含税）。
words: NEW 8th Edition Fairfax Circuit Court Practice Manual (2014)

sentence: It notes that the manual comes with a USB drive and offers options for pickup at the FBA office or shipping for an additional $25.00.
sentence_cn: 它指出该手册附带一个 USB 驱动器，并提供在 FBA 办公室取货或额外支付 25.00 美元运费的选项。

sentence: A blue button with the text "CLICK HERE TO ORDER NOW!" is prominently featured at the bottom.
sentence_cn: 底部显著的位置有一个蓝色按钮，上面写着“单击此处立即订购！”。

sentence: The overall design combines architectural imagery with marketing text to advertise the legal manual.
sentence_cn: 整体设计将建筑图像与营销文字相结合，以宣传法律手册。
